title: Champagne Vending Machine in Las Vegas - Where to Find Champagne Vending Machine
text:
Last year, it was reported that a bar in London was using a Champagne vending machine to draw in customers. Now, one of those glorious machines has arrived in the States.
The Mandarin Oriental Hotel in Las Vegas now boasts the first public Champagne vending machine in the U.S. Located in the hotel's "Sky Bar" on the 23rd floor, it not only sells mini bottles of Mo√´t & Chandon, but also tiny flutes, so you can sip in style.
 But don't start saving up quarters just yet.
According to Travel + Leisure , guests must purchase a $20 coin from the front desk in order to use the machine and provide an ID proving they are of legal drinking age.
After the details are all sorted out, simply drop the coin into the machine and voil√†! It's time for a toast.
